info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 25 at 12:49PM EDT until July 25 at 8:00PM EDT by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 115 PM EDT FOR HUDSON...SOUTHEASTERN BERGEN...SOUTHEASTERN ESSEX...QUEENS... BRONX AND NEW YORK (MANHATTAN) COUNTIES... At 1248 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Teterboro, or over Ridgefield, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and power lines. This severe storm will be near... Bergenfield and Midtown Manhattan around 1255 PM EDT. Mott Haven and RFK Bridge around 100 PM EDT. East Tremont and Laguardia Airport around 105 PM EDT. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
